{{cpp/locale/locale/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl rev multi|until1=c++11
|dcl1=
const locale&amp; operator=( const locale&amp; other ) throw();
|dcl2=
const locale&amp; operator=( const locale&amp; other ) noexcept;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Creates a copy of {{c|other}}, replacing the contents of {{c|*this}}. The reference counts of all facets held by {{c|other}} are incremented. The reference counts of all facets previously held by {{c|*this}} are decremented, and those facets whose reference count becomes zero are deleted.

===Return value===
Returns {{c|*this}}, which is now a copy of {{c|other}}.
